urls.title: Regulating for people, the environment and growth
urls.description: Environment Agency annual reports on our regulation work and the environmental performance of regulated businesses in England.

text:
The @EnvAgency has published the Regulating for People, the Environment and Growth report. 

Regulation is an important tool which we can use to leave the environment in a better state than we found it. 

Read the full report here: https://t.co/Vc0iVG4B5h https://t.co/ti45Wu0Hn4

RT @EnvAgency: Today we have published our Regulating for People, the Environment and Growth report.

It shows the importance of regulation‚Ä¶

urls.title: Environment Agency drops pollution incident reporting
